name: trace_id
description: Trace ID of extrinsic (of the form '{blocknumber}-{index}')

name: section
description: Trace pallet/section (if available), generally inferred from the decoded key

name: storage
description: trace storage (if available), generally inferred from the decoded key

name: pk_extra
description: If the trace key can be decoded, this includes any additional decoded data beyond the section/storage information in JSON form

name: pv
description: If the trace value can be decoded, this included the decoded value in JSON form
